channel.title: Adventure on The Guyana Brief
channel.description: Recent content in Adventure on The Guyana Brief

item.title: Speedeet & Wilar: De Mango Tree War
item.description: Everybody on Pike Street know dat de BEST julie mango tree belong to Miss Doreen. Everybody also know dat Miss Doreen does guard dem mango like gold. So when Speedeet come up wid a plan to ’liberate’ some mango… well, yuh know how DIS gon end.

item.title: Speedeet & Wilar: De Hospital Cat Hunt
item.description: Speedeet brother Derek get bite by carpet labaria at Tumatumari and end up in Georgetown Hospital. But while de family visiting, Speedeet and Wilar find a different kind of adventure in de hospital compound.

item.title: Speedeet & Wilar: De Solar Panel Mix-Up
item.description: Speedeet cousin from Rupununi come to visit and bring story about the government solar panels. But Wilar grandmother got she own ideas about 'free electricity.'

item.title: Speedeet & Wilar and the Mystery of the Missing Medical Records
item.description: When Speedeet’s grandmother can’t find her medical file at the clinic, the two friends discover that going digital isn’t as simple as pressing a button.

item.title: Speedeet & Wilar: De Mango Tree Incident
item.description: Speedeet got a plan fuh get de biggest mango from Mr. Chan shop yard, and Wilar know is trouble but he going anyway. Wha could go wrong?
